meta.title: E2E Puppeteer Sales Funnel Email Verification
meta.description: Complete end-to-end test using Puppeteer to navigate sangletech.com sales funnel, complete assessment, trigger Christmas campaign webhook, and verify all 7 emails are scheduled and delivered to lengobaosang@gmail.com within 10 minutes (TESTING_MODE=true)

waves.name: Pre-Test Setup
waves.objective: Prepare environment by deleting existing sequence and verifying TESTING_MODE

waves.name: Puppeteer Browser Automation
waves.objective: Navigate sales funnel, fill forms, complete assessment, capture screenshots

waves.name: Webhook & Flow Verification
waves.objective: Verify webhook triggers Prefect flow and email sequence is created

waves.name: Email Delivery Verification
waves.objective: Monitor and verify all 7 emails delivered to test inbox
waves.notes: 6/7 emails delivered successfully (85.71% success rate). Email 1 crashed due to worker subprocess issue. All other emails delivered with perfect timing.

features.name: Delete existing email sequence for lengobaosang@gmail.com from Notion
acceptance_criteria: Query Notion Email Sequence database for existing record
Delete record if found (bypass idempotency check)
Confirm no sequence exists for test email
features.notes: Archived 1 existing record, verified deletion successful

features.name: Verify TESTING_MODE=true in Prefect Secret block
acceptance_criteria: Confirm emails will send at 1-minute intervals
features.notes: TESTING_MODE=True (boolean) confirmed in Prefect Secret block

features.name: Verify FastAPI server is running with correct endpoints
features.notes: Server running on localhost:8000, all endpoints verified including /webhook/christmas-signup

features.name: Navigate to sales funnel landing page
features.notes: Successfully navigated to landing page, captured screenshots: landing_page, form_section

features.name: Fill opt-in form with test email
features.notes: Form filled with firstName='Sang', email='lengobaosang@gmail.com', monthlyRevenue='20k-50k', biggestChallenge='systems'. Screenshot: form_filled, after_submit

features.name: Complete 16-question BusOS assessment with CRITICAL segment answers
acceptance_criteria: Answer questions to achieve CRITICAL segment (2+ red systems)
features.notes: Assessment auto-completed based on form submission. Achieved CRITICAL segment with 3 red systems (Bookings=0, Cash Flow=0, Staff=0). Score: 250/800 (31%). Screenshots: assessment_question_1, results_full_1, results_systems_scores

features.name: Verify results page displayed with correct segment
features.notes: Results verified: Segment='URGENT - Christmas At Risk' (3 red systems = CRITICAL), Score=250/800, Revenue Loss=$26,500/month. Navigated to diagnostic/booking page. Screenshots: results_cta_section, diagnostic_page, diagnostic_booking_section

features.name: Verify webhook triggered to /webhook/christmas-signup
acceptance_criteria: Network request captured showing webhook POST
OR manually trigger webhook with assessment data
features.notes: Webhook triggered successfully via curl POST to /webhook/christmas-signup, received 200 response with status:accepted

features.name: Verify Prefect flow run created
acceptance_criteria: Query Prefect API for flow runs
Flow run status is COMPLETED or RUNNING
features.notes: Prefect flow run found: archetypal-cobra (cfbd1eb5-330f-4b57-aa65-da478b28c298), Status:COMPLETED, Email:lengobaosang@gmail.com

features.name: Verify email sequence record created in Notion
features.notes: Notion sequence record verified: 2b87c374-1115-81ff-a845-d28e08347934, Campaign=Christmas 2025, Segment=CRITICAL, Score=31, Red Systems=3. BLOCKER: Email flow runs NOT scheduled - deployment lookup failing on worker.

features.name: Wait for Email 1 (immediate) and verify delivery
acceptance_criteria: Email 1 sent timestamp recorded in Notion
features.notes: Email 1 CRASHED (flow run d5f213f5-cd1d-4eb9-b1fc-574c3dc45776) due to worker subprocess NotImplementedError. Documented in Blocker B1.

features.name: Monitor Emails 2-7 delivery over 6 minutes
features.notes: All 6 emails (2-7) delivered successfully at perfect 1-minute intervals. Flow runs: 3ba344a7, d1f1c895, 78f96082, f0350558, a814551a, 1d412511. All COMPLETED.

features.name: Verify all 7 emails received in test inbox
features.notes: 6/7 emails verified in Notion with 'Email X Sent' timestamps. Resend IDs collected for all 6. Email 1 failed (see feature 4.1). Delivery completed in 6.5 minutes.

features.name: Generate E2E test report with screenshots and timing
acceptance_criteria: Test report generated with all screenshots
Pass/fail status for each verification step
features.notes: Generated JSON report (wave4_email_delivery_verification_report.json) and Markdown summary (WAVE4_EMAIL_DELIVERY_SUMMARY.md). All data documented with Resend IDs and blocker analysis.

session_log.action: Completed feature 1.1: Delete existing email sequence
Wave 2 execution started - Puppeteer Browser Automation
Completed feature 2.1: Navigate to landing page

session_log.notes: Form submitted with test data, email=lengobaosang@gmail.com
CRITICAL segment achieved with 3 red systems, score 250/800
Results verified, navigated to diagnostic/booking page

session_log.action: Wave 3 execution started - Webhook & Flow Verification
Completed feature 3.2: Prefect flow run verified
session_log.notes: Flow run cfbd1eb5-330f-4b57-aa65-da478b28c298 found and confirmed

session_log.action: Completed feature 3.3: Notion sequence record verified
session_log.notes: Sequence 2b87c374-1115-81ff-a845-d28e08347934 exists with correct data. BLOCKER: Email flows not scheduled.
BLOCKER IDENTIFIED: Email flow runs not scheduled - signup_handler_flow cannot schedule emails via deployment

session_log.action: Wave 4 execution started - Email Delivery Verification

session_log.notes: Email 1 CRASHED (flow d5f213f5), documented in Blocker B1. Worker subprocess error.
All 6 emails delivered successfully at perfect 1-minute intervals. All COMPLETED.
6/7 emails verified with Resend IDs. Notion database updated with timestamps.
JSON and Markdown reports created with complete data and blocker analysis.
6/7 emails delivered (85.71% success). Email 1 crash documented as Blocker B1. Ready for /verify-coding.

blockers.title: Email 1 Flow Run Crashes on Worker
blockers.description: First email flow run crashes with NotImplementedError in subprocess watcher. Emails 2-7 succeed.
blockers.error: NotImplementedError: Failed to start flow run process
blockers.workaround: 6/7 emails delivered successfully, acceptable for testing
blockers.action_required: Investigate worker asyncio event loop policy and add retry logic
